Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION
REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION

Title: Relates to the definition of drug-related paraphernalia
Summary: Relates to the definition of drug-related paraphernalia; clarifies that drug-related paraphernalia shall not impact substances that are not considered controlled substances.
LawCode: Amd ยง850, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to clarifying the definition of drug-related paraphernalia
